room_title: Escape room "Asylum 2.0" by Twisted Key Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was the best escape room my family and I have done so far! The Asylum Room was designed so well and we felt immersed in the theme. We definitely would like to come back and try the other room.

room_title: Escape room "Asylum 2.0" by Twisted Key Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Super fun! The Asylum was an awesome mind teaser and a great challenge for a group of people to solve! The staff was very friendly and helpful and we had a blast! Will definitely go back for the CSI!

room_title: Escape room "Asylum 2.0" by Twisted Key Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I want super impressed with this place! I've been to most of the rooms in the DFW area and this is one of the top 3 for me. I did the Asylum and the puzzles were very unique and clever. Very satisfying solutions. And the theme and production quality were excellent! I will definitely be coming back to do the rest of the rooms here.

room_title: Escape room "Asylum 2.0" by Twisted Key Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: It was our first time doing an escape room and we are already planning to go back and attempt the CSI room! It was wonderfully unique and so much fun. We managed to escape the Asylum within the hour and can't wait to see if we have what it takes to beat the other room! The owners were amazing and very helpful. Do yourself a favor and check it out.

room_title: Escape room "Asylum 2.0" by Twisted Key Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This place is amazing! We did the Asylum and they put a lot of effort into this room! It is not easy to get through but they also help you to make sure you don't get stuck in on stop for too long. One of the things I love about Twisted Key is that they let you finish the room even if your hour is up. I can't wait to go back and do the CSI Room!
